greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Least k such that A072084(k) = n.
comment: If p is a Mersenne-prime then a(p) = 2^p - 1 (A000120(2^n-1)=n), for other primes p: a(p) > 2^p - 1.
This sequence may be multiplicative. - Mitch Harris, Apr 19 2005
formula: Completely multiplicative with a(p) = A061712(p). - _David W. Wilson_, Aug 03 2005
program: a072087 n = product $ map a061712 $ a027746_row n
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 14 2002
ext: More terms from _David W. Wilson_, Aug 03 2005
